syllabus_info.title: Cambridge IGCSE Information and Communication Technology

learning_objectives.notes_and_guidance:
Characteristics, uses, advantages and disadvantages of:
Optical Mark Recognition (OMR) including school registers, multiple-choice examination papers, barcode, QR code
Optical Character Recognition (OCR) including automated number plate recognition (ANPR) systems
Radio Frequency Identification Device (RFID) including tracking stock, passports, automobiles, contactless payment
Near Field Communication (NFC) including payment using a smartphone
Biometric recognition including face, iris, retina, finger, thumb, hand, voice
